page.title: 15A Sunday in the Life of Kel.
page.content: At 8 o'clock I woke up but I didn't get dressed and go downstairs until 25 to 9. At a quarter to 9 I had my breakfast of "Weetabix" and then at 10 to 9 I watched a video of the FA Cup Final. My favourite team Manchester Utd. had won the cup the day before, beating Everton 1-0. A GREAT VIDEO! At a quarter past 9 I went to play football with my friend John Clarkson. I went home at 1 o'clock and I had my dinner. After dinner I went out again at 1.30pm on my BMX bike. I played on my bicycle until I went to my Granddad's house at 3 o'clock. We came home at 4.15 and I went out to play again. I had my tea at 6.45 and a bath at 7.30pm. I finally went to bed at 9.15pm.
